content:
Diagnosis:		Bladder adenocarcinoma T3bN1M0

Management:		12 Jan 2024 Radical cystectomy with pelvic lymph node dissection
			15 Feb 2024 Commenced adjuvant pembrolizumab

Histology:		Moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma, MSI-high/dMMR positive
			3/15 pelvic nodes positive
			Stage pT3bN1M0

Current Situation:	Pre-cycle 4 pembrolizumab

I reviewed [redacted name] today prior to cycle 4 of adjuvant pembrolizumab. Treatment has been well tolerated with only grade 1 fatigue which is improving. Recent CT shows no evidence of disease recurrence. Blood tests are satisfactory for proceeding with treatment. Performance status remains 0.

The plan is to continue with cycle 4 today and arrange follow-up CT in 3 months. Will review again before cycle 5 in 3 weeks.

cancer_timeline.value: Radical cystectomy with pelvic lymph node dissection
CT shows no evidence of disease recurrence

status_updates.value: Post-operative bladder cancer on adjuvant immunotherapy. Good treatment tolerance with no evidence of recurrence
